User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user in the system.

avatarUrl.description: URL for the user's avatar image.

roleId.description: The ID of the role assigned to the user.

personalDocument.description: The user's personal document number (e.g., CPF).

teamIds.description: An array of team IDs the user belongs to.

_tokenRefreshed.description: A timestamp used to trigger client-side token refreshes.

Project.title: Project
Project.description: Represents a project within the task and project funnel.

ownerId.description: Reference to a User who is the project owner.

teamMembers.description: References to Users who are part of the project team.

technicalDetails.description: Technical specifications and details of the project.

Task.title: Task
Task.description: Represents a task within a project.

isCompleted.description: Indicates whether the task is completed.

dependentTaskIds.description: References to other Tasks that must be completed before this task can be started. (Relationship: Task 1:N Task)

assigneeId.description: Reference to a User who is responsible for the task.

dueDate.description: The due date for the task.

isRecurring.description: Indicates if the task is recurring.

recurrenceEndDate.description: The end date for the recurrence.

Stage.title: Stage
Stage.description: Represents a stage in the project funnel. Stages contain tasks.

order.description: The order of the stage in the funnel.  Lower numbers mean earlier in the funnel.

Team.title: Team
Team.description: Represents a team within the organization.

description.description: Description of the team's purpose or responsibilities.

leaderId.description: The ID of the user who is the team leader.

directorateId.description: The ID of the directorate the team is linked to.

kpis.description: Key Performance Indicators for the team.

Directorate.title: Directorate
Directorate.description: Represents a directorate or division within the organization.

description.description: A brief description of the directorate's purpose.

directorId.description: The ID of the user who is the director.

Role.title: Role
Role.description: Represents a user role within the organization with detailed HR information.

description.description: A brief summary of the role's main purpose.

department.description: The department the role belongs to.

hierarchyLevel.description: The hierarchical level of the role.

supervisorRoleId.description: The ID of the role this role reports to.

mission.description: The strategic mission or objective of the role.

responsibilities.description: A list of the main responsibilities.

kpis.description: Key Performance Indicators for this role.

requiredSkills.description: List of technical and behavioral skills required for the role.

salaryRange.description: The minimum and maximum salary range for this role.

isManager.description: Indicates if this role has manager-level privileges, such as viewing all data.

isDev.description: Indicates if this role has developer-level privileges with full system access.

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.description: Represents a contact, which can be a client, a supplier, or a partner.

companyName.description: The name of the company the contact works for.

ProjectFile.title: ProjectFile
ProjectFile.description: Represents a file uploaded to a project.

url.description: The public URL of the file in Firebase Storage.

size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

type.description: The MIME type of the file.

uploadedAt.description: The timestamp when the file was uploaded.

uploaderId.description: The ID of the user who uploaded the file.

Contract.title: Contract
Contract.description: Represents a contract or important document.

description.description: A brief description of the contract.

vendor.description: The vendor or third-party associated with the contract.

assetId.description: Optional: The ID of the asset this contract is linked to.

projectId.description: Optional: The ID of the project this contract is linked to.

startDate.description: The start date of the contract.

endDate.description: The end date of the contract.

fileUrl.description: The URL of the uploaded contract file in Firebase Storage.

uploaderId.description: The ID of the user who uploaded the contract.

uploadedAt.description: The timestamp when the file was uploaded.

Reimbursement.title: Reimbursement
Reimbursement.description: Represents a reimbursement request from a user.

requesterId.description: The ID of the user requesting the reimbursement.

status.description: The current status of the request.

requestDate.description: The date the request was made.

decisionDate.description: The date the request was approved or rejected.

approverId.description: The ID of the user who approved or rejected the request.

receiptUrl.description: URL of the uploaded receipt image or document.

notes.description: Additional notes from the requester or approver.

costCenterId.description: The ID of the cost center this reimbursement is associated with.

Chat.title: Chat
Chat.description: Represents a chat conversation between two or more users.

userIds.description: An array of user IDs participating in the chat.

lastMessage.description: The last message sent in the chat for preview purposes.

users.description: Denormalized user data for quick display.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a single message within a chat.

chatId.description: The ID of the chat this message belongs to.

senderId.description: The ID of the user who sent the message.

timestamp.description: The time the message was sent.

read.description: Whether the message has been read by the recipient(s).

Notification.title: Notification
Notification.description: Represents a notification for a user.

Product.title: Product
Product.description: Represents a product that can be associated with a seal.

status.description: The current status of the product.

Seal.title: Seal
Seal.description: Represents a certification seal issued to a contact for a specific product.

Checklist.title: Checklist
Checklist.description: Represents a standardized checklist for a team.

description.description: A brief description of the checklist's purpose.

teamId.description: The ID of the team this checklist is for.

ChecklistItem.title: ChecklistItem
ChecklistItem.description: Represents a single step or item within a checklist.

checklistId.description: The ID of the parent checklist.

description.description: The text of the checklist item/step.

order.description: The numerical order of the item in the list.

isCompleted.description: Indicates if the checklist item is completed.

Asset.title: Asset
Asset.description: Represents a physical or digital asset of the company.

location.description: Physical or digital location of the asset.

assigneeId.description: The ID of the user the asset is assigned to.

lastMaintenanceDate.description: Date of the last maintenance performed.

nextMaintenanceDate.description: Date for the next scheduled maintenance.

AssetHistory.title: AssetHistory
AssetHistory.description: Represents a log entry for an asset's history.

assetId.description: The ID of the associated asset.

details.description: Additional details about the event, like user IDs involved.

actorId.description: The ID of the user who performed the action.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the history event.

AssetMaintenance.title: AssetMaintenance
AssetMaintenance.description: Represents a maintenance schedule for an asset.

assetId.description: The ID of the associated asset.

scheduledDate.description: The date the maintenance is scheduled for.

completedDate.description: The date the maintenance was completed.

CostCenter.title: CostCenter
CostCenter.description: Represents a cost center for financial tracking.

name.description: The name of the cost center (e.g., 'Marketing', 'Operations').

code.description: A unique code for the cost center (e.g., 'MKT-001').

description.description: A brief description of the cost center's purpose.

responsibleId.description: The ID of the user responsible for this cost center.

/users/{userId}.description: Represents a user of the application. Contains profile information.

/users/{userId}/notifications/{notificat.description: Contains notifications for a specific user.

/directorates/{directorateId}.description: Represents a directorate or division. Contains 'name' and 'description'.

/roles/{roleId}.description: Represents a user role. Contains 'id', 'name', 'description', and 'isManager'.

/contacts/{contactId}.description: Represents a contact, either a client, a supplier, or a partner.

/projects/{projectId}/stages/{stageId}.description: Represents a stage within a project. Contains 'id', 'name', 'description', and 'order'.

/projects/{projectId}/tasks/{taskId}.description: Represents a task within a stage. Contains 'id', 'name', 'description', 'projectId', 'stageId', 'isCompleted', 'assigneeId', 'dueDate', and 'dependentTaskIds'.

/projects/{projectId}/files/{fileId}.description: Represents a file associated with a specific project.

/contracts/{contractId}.description: Stores all contracts and important documents.

/chats/{chatId}/messages/{messageId}.description: Contains all messages for a given chat.

/products/{productId}.description: Stores all products that can be certified with a seal.

/checklists/{checklistId}/items/{itemId}.description: Stores the items for a specific checklist.

/assets/{assetId}/history/{historyId}.description: Stores the history of an asset.

/maintenances/{maintenanceId}.description: Stores maintenance records for all assets.

/costCenters/{costCenterId}.description: Stores all company cost centers for financial tracking.
